chunks.text_preview: Buy Windows Midsize Hakose Urushi | Minase | Made in Japan. Windows midsize Hakose is handmade in Japan. Hakose uses urushi lacquer, paint and metal powder (makie) to decorate the dials.. ProductGroup. Leather straps. https://minasewatches.com/webshop/windows-midsize-hakose-steel/#webpage. Quantitat

. The Urushi lacquer technique uses the sap of the eponymous Asian tree to create watch dials of unparalleled beauty and depth of color. static_fields.name: Buy Windows Midsize Hakose Urushi | Minase | Made in Japan
static_fields.description: Windows midsize Hakose is handmade in Japan. Hakose uses urushi lacquer, paint and metal powder (makie) to decorate the dials.

hasVariant.name: Windows Midsize Hakose Steel - Hoshimi Sakura
hasVariant.description: The Urushi lacquer technique uses the sap of the eponymous Asian tree to create watch dials of unparalleled beauty and depth of color. Inspired by intoxicating local landscapes or traditional motives, each dial is handcrafted by a highly skilled artisan. Urushi lacquer has been used in Japanese culture for over 7000 years.
